context: Commvault Systems, Inc. is a data protection and management software company focused on backup, recovery, and data management across cloud and on-premises. Unified data management platform. Archive and compliance features.

competitors.name: Veritas NetBackup (Symantec)
competitors.notes: Market leader in enterprise backup software following the Symantec-Veritas merger in July 2005. NetBackup was Veritas's flagship product and maintained dominance in the enterprise backup market.

competitors.name: EMC
competitors.notes: Major player in the backup and storage market, competing with backup software and storage solutions for enterprise data centers.

competitors.name: IBM
competitors.notes: Enterprise backup and storage vendor with Tivoli Storage Manager, competing in the enterprise data protection market.

competitors.name: HP
competitors.notes: Enterprise backup solutions provider competing in the data center backup market.

competitors.name: Backup Exec
competitors.notes: Backup software targeting the SMB market, part of Veritas/Symantec portfolio, competing in the mid-market backup segment.
